name: purefunctor.me
description: My personal portfolio website written in PureScript.

scripts._pre: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp public/* dist
scripts._live: pnpm _pre; cp dist/index.html dist/404.html; WATCH=true node ./build.js & http-server dist
scripts.build: spago build -u '--codegen corefn' && zephyr -f Main.main && pnpm _build
